      • run

        public boolean run()
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Run the UI event loop, if applicable.
        Specified by:
        run in interface MetermanUI
        Returns:
        true if the main thread should call Meterman.shutdown() after run() returns; false if the UI will call shutdown() itself when the UI is closed (as in the case for Swing/AWT interfaces, where event dispatch is performed on a separate non-daemon thread).

      • setGameName

        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Sets the frame title (or equivalent) and About menu text to show the game name.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • openURL

        public void openURL(String url)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Opens a web browser to the given URL, if applicable. If the UI doesn't support this, or the URL is malformed, nothing will happen.
        Specified by:
        openURL in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        url - URL to open

      • loadImage

        public void loadImage(String name,
             Path p)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Load an image into the UI. JPEG and PNG (with bitmask transparency) are supported.
        Specified by:
        loadImage in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        name - name by which the image will be referred to in the setXXXImage() methods.
        p - path of the image file.

      • setFrameImage

        public void setFrameImage(String imageName)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Sets the image displayed in the main UI frame. The recommended size for frame images is 150x400 pixels, or an integer fraction of that, in which case the image will be scaled up.
        Specified by:
        setFrameImage in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        imageName - name of the image, as chosen in MetermanUI.loadImage(String, Path)

      • getFrameImage

        public String getFrameImage()
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Get the name of the current frame image. This can be useful if a game object wants to save the current image name so that it can restore it later.
        Specified by:
        getFrameImage in interface MetermanUI
        Returns:
        the name of the current frame image.

      • setEntityImage

        public void setEntityImage(String imageName)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Sets the entity image that will be drawn inset in the frame image. The recommended size for entity images is 140x140 pixels, or an integer fraction of that, in which case the image will be scaled up; the image itself should have a border to visually separate it from the frame image.
        Specified by:
        setEntityImage in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        imageName - name of the image, as chosen in MetermanUI.loadImage(String, Path)

      • getEntityImage

        public String getEntityImage()
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI

        Specified by:
        getEntityImage in interface MetermanUI
        Returns:
        the name of the current entity image.

                      String modifiers)

        Adds an entity to the list of entities in the player's inventory.
        Specified by:
        addInventoryEntity in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        e - entity to add
        modifiers - string to append to the list display for the entity, to indicate status like worn or equipped. Will be null if there are no modifiers.

        Parameters:

        Specified by:

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • showTextDialog

        public void showTextDialog(String header,
                  String text,
                  String buttonLabel)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Displays a modal dialog showing a passage of text.
        Specified by:
        showTextDialog in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        header - header surmounted above the text passage
        text - text passage (line-breaks kept intact)
        buttonLabel - label of the button to dismiss dialog

      • showPromptDialog

        public String showPromptDialog(String header,
                      String text,
                      String prompt,
                      String initialText)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Displays a modal dialog showing a passage of text and a field for the user to enter a line of text.
        Specified by:
        showPromptDialog in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        header - header surmounted above the text passage
        text - text passage (line-breaks kept intact)
        prompt - prompt displayed in front of the field
        initialText - the text initially set in the text field
        Returns:
        the text entered by the user

      • showListDialog

        public <T> T showListDialog(String header,
                   String text,
                   List<T> items,
                   boolean showCancelButton)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Shows a dialog allowing the user to select one of a list of items.
        Specified by:
        showListDialog in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        header - header surmounted above the text passage
        text - text passage (line-breaks kept intact)
        items - items from which the user can select one
        showCancelButton - if true, a cancel button will be shown; if clicked, this method will return null
        Returns:
        the item selected, or null if no item selected.

      • showImageDialog

        public void showImageDialog(String header,
                   String imageName,
                   int scale,
                   String text,
                   String buttonLabel)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Shows a dialog displaying an image.
        Specified by:
        showImageDialog in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        header - header surmounted above the image
        imageName - name of the image, as chosen in MetermanUI.loadImage(String, Path)
        scale - the factor (>= 1) by which the image will be scaled before being shown
        text - text passage (line-breaks kept intact) shown below the image
        buttonLabel - label of the button used to dismiss dialog

      • showWaitDialog

        public void showWaitDialog(String message)
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Displays an always-on-top dialog with a message, that stays visible until hidden. It is intended to inform the user when a potentially long-running operation is taking place.
        Specified by:
        showWaitDialog in interface MetermanUI
        Parameters:
        message - message to show

      • hideWaitDialog

        public void hideWaitDialog()
        Description copied from interface: MetermanUI
        Hides the dialog previously shown by MetermanUI.showWaitDialog(String).
        Specified by:
        hideWaitDialog in interface MetermanUI
